ygData.subject: Re: Lullaby theory
ygData.msgSnippet: When my friend uses Lullaby on his secondary character, it s always sung (since I d posted about seeing it used effectively awhile back). We are still seeing
ygData.messageBody:
When my friend uses Lullaby on his secondary character, it's always sung
(since I'd posted about seeing it used effectively awhile back). We are
still seeing renewed use out of this song in Unrest in the mid-20s,
although now we often get an enchanter in the group, and AE mes makes
any other ae attacks undesirable.

I can still vouch for lullaby's value to higher level bards myself,
however. I took out a judicator in Cazic-Thule the other day solo and it
never got a single heal off, 5 clean interrupts and then it died. I
think the only cleric more difficult in Cazic is the Cenobite, and I
wouldn't lay odds on him stacking up 1 on 1 well against a 50 Bard
either. I mean heck if the fight were even looking close there is always
Chains and Fear. =P

Ariell Thunderwolf, Karana
